column5: Wow all i can say was what a awesome time i had with my friend from down south for 2 days fishing brookies at a good old age of 77 this man can push pull quads through the bush like he is 20 years old and has taught me a few things about the elusive brook trout here are some more pics !!! I did get 3 of the fish on video for my friend so he can show his family the days he spends with me....
Love it. Â Hope I still have it In me at that age.
